traits.name: Nullification
traits.desc: The light cadejo exists to undo the evil done by its wicked cousin. While a light cadejo is within 120 feet of a dark cadejo, the dark cadejo makes ability checks, attacks, and saving throws at disadvantage. Additionally, the dark cadejo’s Paralysis and Stench features do not function. However, any attacks, ability checks, and saving throws resulting from direct combat with a light cadejo are made without disadvantage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The light cadejo makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) damage.

actions.name: Restorative Touch
actions.desc: A light cadejo touches a willing creature. The touch acts as the spell lesser restoration.
